title: Bright White Subtle Sheen with Black Thread Work Super Soft Premium Cotton Designer Shirt
story_description:
Story Introducing the ultimate addition to any gentleman's wardrobe - a bright white designer shirt
that exudes elegance and sophistication. Crafted from a slight sheen fabric blended with pure
cotton, this shirt is not only incredibly comfortable but also durable and long-lasting. The regular
spread collar and long sleeve design of this shirt give it a classic look, while the concealed
plackets add a touch of functionality and practicality. The black Thread work at the placket lends a
subtle yet striking detail to the shirt, making it stand out from the rest. Whether you're pairing
it with a tailored suit for a formal event or wearing it with jeans for a casual day out, this shirt
is versatile and can be dressed up or down as per your preference.

Limited quantity, Seasonal collection. We change our fashion very frequently. Grab it before it
disappears
Premium mother-of-pearl buttons
Satin weave: A type of textile weave, Satin is somewhat shinier than the average Poplin weave. The
fabric thus created is more lustrous and gives an exclusive look to the shirt.
Medium weight fabric, ideal for all climates.

title: Bright White With Artisanal Aari Embroidery Super Soft Premium Cotton Designer Shirt
story_description:
Story Discover the epitome of style and luxury with our Bright White Designer Shirt. Made from
super soft premium cotton, this exquisite shirt boasts artisanal Aari embroidery, meticulously
crafted by skilled artisans. The intricate details and handcrafted embellishments add a touch of
elegance and sophistication, making it a true statement piece for any occasion. Experience
unparalleled comfort and impeccable craftsmanship as you indulge in the luxurious feel of the fabric
against your skin. With its timeless appeal and exceptional quality, this Bright White Designer
Shirt is a must-have addition to your wardrobe. Shop now and elevate your style to new heights.

title: Bright White Pleated Super Soft Premium Cotton Tuxedo Shirt
story_description:
Story This Bright White half sleeved Tuxedo Shirt is a luxurious and stylish addition to any
premium wardrobe. Made from slight sheen with cotton blend fabric, this shirt is soft to the touch
and incredibly comfortable to wear. The pleated front and half sleeves give it a sophisticated look,
while the bright white color and tux pleats add a touch of edginess. Perfect for casual occasions or
a night out in the town, this shirt is sure to turn heads.

story_description:
Story Looking for a stylish upgrade to your wardrobe? Look no further than our stylish Designer
Shirt with black collar and cuffs! Crafted from slight sheen fabric blended with premium cotton,
this shirt is all you need to turn heads wherever you go. Featuring a zip fastening, pair it with
jeans and a sneakers for a look that's sure to impress. And if you're feeling adventurous, try
layering it up for some added depth and dimension. So if you're ready to take your style game to the
next level, grab this shirt today!

story_description:
Story This Christmas all you need is this solid white deer embroidered shirt to make your evening
more special. Cut to a regular fit for all-day comfort, this shirt features a regular spread collar,
coconut shell button fastening, and full sleeves. Club it with your favourite chinos or jeans and
loafers or sneakers; both ways you are gonna steal everyone’s attention.

title: Bright White and Black Twill Premium Cotton Designer Shirt
story_description:
Story One unique aspect of a French Crown designer shirt is the meticulous attention to detail in
its tailoring. Indulge in the sheer opulence of this extraordinary designer shirt and elevate your
fashion game to unparalleled heights. Tailored using premium cotton, this shirt is incredibly soft
and comfortable. The playful solid white and black design makes a bold fashion statement, making it
the perfect addition to your collection. Shop now and elevate your style with French Crown's
luxurious and trendy designs.
description:
One unique aspect of a French Crown designer shirt is the meticulous attention to detail in its
tailoring. Indulge in the sheer opulence of this extraordinary designer shirt and elevate your
fashion game to unparalleled heights. Tailored using premium cotton, this shirt is incredibly soft
and comfortable. The playful solid white and black design makes a bold fashion statement, making it
the perfect addition to your collection. Shop now and elevate your style with French Crown's
luxurious and trendy designs.100 % Premium Giza Cotton:  Long staple, smother, resistant to pilling, greater resistance to
abrasion and stretching, brighter and more precisely defined with a soft and silky texture and
considerable resistance over time.
Limited quantity, Seasonal collection. We change our fashion very frequently. Grab it before it
disappears
Twill: Twill is made by weaving twin horizontal threads under and over vertical threads to create a
distinctive diagonal pattern. Twill fabric is soft and thick, resistant to creases and easy to iron.
It also drapes very well, producing a smart result.
Medium weight fabric. Made for all climates.

title: Bright White with Black Cuffs and Collar Dobby Textured Premium Giza Cotton Shirt
story_description:
Story Having formal shirts is a necessity as they give a perfect outfit for every event and French
Crown workwear during the day can be easily transformed into party wear at night. This piece
features a black spread collar with cuffs and is made using a smooth cotton fabric that is robust,
long-lasting, and less likely to rip or tear. Specially crafted for office wear, the shirt can be
clubbed with formal pants and oxford shoes.

title: Bright White Dobby Textured Premium Giza Cotton Bohemian Inspired Designer Shirt
story_description:
Story If you love white shirts then no coloured shirt can impress you. Grab this amazing shirt from
French Crown featuring a functional drawstring, a spread collar, and full sleeves. Tailored using
regular fit, this shirt is made using the best quality cotton for top-notch comfort. Style this
shirt with denim jeans and sneakers for an appealing look.

title: Bright White Dobby Textured Premium Giza Cotton Shirt
story_description:
Story Having formal shirts is a necessity as they give a perfect outfit for every event and French
Crown workwear during the day can be easily transformed into party wear at night. This piece
features a spread collar with full sleeves and is made using a smooth cotton fabric that is robust,
long-lasting, and less likely to rip or tear. Specially crafted for office wear, the shirt can be
clubbed with formal pants and oxford shoes.

story_description:

statement piece for any premium party! Crafted from the slight sheen fabric blended with finest

title: Bright White Twill Premium Cotton Designer Shirt with Zipper Closure
story_description:
Story If you never want to go out of style, always add classic pieces to your wardrobe. A
well-fitted white shirt will never fail when you have ‘nothing to wear.’ Made to a comfy regular
fit, it features a regular spread collar and zipper fastening. Go for basic blue denim and sneakers
to style this piece.
description:
If you never want to go out of style, always add classic pieces to your wardrobe. A well-fitted
white shirt will never fail when you have ‘nothing to wear.’ Made to a comfy regular fit, it
features a regular spread collar and zipper fastening. Go for basic blue denim and sneakers to style
this piece.100 % Premium Giza Cotton:  Long staple, smother, resistant to pilling, greater resistance to
abrasion and stretching, brighter and more precisely defined with a soft and silky texture and
considerable resistance over time.
Limited quantity, Seasonal collection. We change our fashion very frequently. Grab it before it
disappears
Twill: Twill is made by weaving twin horizontal threads under and over vertical threads to create a
distinctive diagonal pattern. Twill fabric is soft and thick, resistant to creases and easy to iron.
It also drapes very well, producing a smart result.
Medium weight fabric. Made for all climates.
